description: Numbers n such that binary expansion does not begin 110.
mathematica: Flatten[Insert[Select[Range[120], If[Length[IntegerDigits[ #, 2]] >= 3, Not[IntegerDigits[ #, 2][[1]] == 1 && IntegerDigits[ #, 2][[2]] == 1 && IntegerDigits[ #, 2][[3]] == 0 ]] &], {0, 1, 2, 3}, 1]] (* _Stefan Steinerberger_, Apr 15 2006 *)Join[{0,1,2,3},Select[Range[4,90],Take[IntegerDigits[#,2],3]!={1,1,0}&]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 27 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
